item.title: Network Plus Course:
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "CompTIA Network Plus" , "IT Certification" , "Cybersecurity" , "Data Security" , "Network Administration" , "Technology Education" , "Professional Development" , "Digital Skills" , "Information Technology" , "Online Learning"
item.description: Learn the best practices for secure asset disposal in network security, including factory reset, wiping configurations, and sanitization methods to ensure data security.

item.title: Network Plus Course: Network Hardening Techniques
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "IT and Networking" , "Cybersecurity" , "Network Administration" , "Information Security" , "Network Hardening" , "Network Infrastructure" , "Network Security" , "CompTIA Network Plus" , "IT Certifications" , "Online Courses"
item.description: Learn the essential techniques for network hardening, including securing SNMP, implementing Router Advertisement Guard, configuring port security, dynamic ARP inspection, control plane policing, and private VLANs.

item.title: Network Plus Course: Ethernet Switching, VLANs, Port Configurations, Security, and More
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Networking" , "CompTIA Network Plus" , "Ethernet Switching" , "Network Infrastructure" , "IT Certifications" , "Network Administration" , "Data Transmission" , "Network Security" , "Switch Configuration" , "Voice VLANs"
item.description: Learn about VLANs, port configurations, security, and other essential features and configurations of Ethernet switches in this comprehensive guide for the CompTIA Network+ Certification Exam.

item.title: CompTIA Network+ Practice Test - SimeonOnSecurity
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.description: Prepare for the CompTIA Network+ exam with our comprehensive practice test. Test your understanding of networking concepts, protocols, network security, and troubleshooting techniques.
